title: Watch: Target Transcends Into Chaos Seconds After Their Exclusive "Galentine's Collection" Stanley Cup Goes On Sale
description:
A pink Stanley Cup has hit stores for Valentine's Day and shoppers are going bad sh*t crazy over them as if their lives depend on it.

Also, New Year's was not even several days ago. Can we please hold off on the Valentine's Day stuff?

According to People:

“Stanley cups became the department store's hottest commodity after the food and beverage container brand released two Target-exclusive Quencher H2.0 FlowState Tumblers. The tumblers come in Cosmo Pink and Target Red and are a part of the brand's "Galentine's Collection."

title: Watch: Government Executes Search Warrant On Amish Farm, Farmer Excercises Too Much Freedom For The USDA To Handle
description:
In a true capitalist society, you would expect the “free market” to be - well I don’t know - free. But that is hardly the case. Every year the government tacks on more regulations with their God complex telling free members of society what they can and cannot do in a so-called free society in the birthplace of what they call “Freedom.”

I once had a very liberal professor tell the class that the Amish were the “perfect” example of success when it comes to Communism. Anyone who knows anything about economics knows that that is a ridiculous claim. If they were communists, then the government would like them. But they are not. So the government hates them and does what it can to try and make Amish people miserable. Especially, when they do things like….. Farming. *Gasp*

title: Watch: Thieves Caught On Camera Looting Bakery, But Not Before Crashing Their Kia Through The Front Of It
description:

Street takeover in Compton leads to wild break-in at Mexican bakery www.youtube.com

title: BC Supreme Court Declares Drug Use On PLAYGROUNDS Is Your Constitutionally Protected Right As A Canadian
description:
At one point in history, society used to enact laws that would protect children as they are our most vulnerable population and cannot often speak up for themselves. Somewhere along the path to degeneracy, policymakers started making laws and implementing "rights" out of thin air. And more often than not, those "rights" always seem to harm those we should be protecting the most.

The B.C. Supreme Court has ruled that people have a "Constitutionally Protected Right" to do drugs on a playground. Yes, a playground. Where drug addicts have absolutely no business being anyway.

— (@)

title: "Clinton Likes Them Young": Unsealed Epstein Docs Allege Bill Clinton Was Who We Said He Was
description:

title: Watch: Nancy Pelosi DEMANDS Americans be grateful for the  "opportunity" Joe Biden has given us. M'kay...
description:

title: 'Good guy with a gun' beats the rap, will not be charged for shooting a thug attempting to rob a taco restaurant
description:
A Houston man will not be facing charges for a 2023 incident where he saved a taqueria from a thug attempting to rob it. If you'll excuse the pun, the man dodged a bullet because Soros-funded Harris County DA Kim Ogg loves herself some criminals. But a grand jury decided not to file charges.

One knucklehead learned a valuable lesson the hard way.

title: Country music shocker: No, the Rascal Flats guitarist is NOT transitioning into being a woman
description:
Make note of where you are right now. You will never forget what you were doing when you heard the shocking news that, no, Joe Don Rooney from the Rascal Flats is NOT transitioning to being a woman. Once you remember which ones are the Rascal Flats and which ones are the Florida-Georgia Line, you may proceed to be blown away by the news.

Rooney made the shocking revelation in a New Year's post letting fans know what he's been up to with something he has not.

There have been so many rumors and opinions thrown around about me - but I’m finally healthy and ready for the world. And NO, I’m not transitioning to be a woman. That thought has never entered my mind. Nothing against the trans community whatsoever but I needed to set the record straight.

title: Watch: Career felon doesn't like being denied bail, so he does the Superfly splash attacking the judge
description:
I was expecting to wake up to Wrestle Kingdom clips this morning (shout out Nic Nemeth), yet the most exciting one came out of of a Las Vegas courtroom. Career felon didn't like what he heard from the judge. So he super-super-superflied her ass. Something tells me he'll now not like what the next judge says a lot worse.

30-year-old Deobra Redden already had three prior felonies. He was being sentence for a fourth, aggravated battery with substantial bodily harm. He wanted probation. Judge Mary Kay Holthus says, "LOL, what do you think this is... New York City or Los Angeles? Probation denied."

If Redden ever gets out of prison, he might be fielding offers from the NFL and WWE. This was quite an impressive leap.
